imdb.plot outline: Afghanistan's first docudrama series. Watch kidnappers duke it out with Kabul cops. The police chase down the largest gold thieves in Afghan history. The detectives race against time to save a child from the clutches of the kidnappers. Mohammed Zahir head of the Kabul Criminal Investigation Unit reveals, for the first time, the most exciting and toughest cases cracked by his hardy bunch of Kabul detectives. Aired on TOLO TV, Afghanistan's largest and most progressive channel with over 55% of the countries viewers, in 2012 for the first time. This ground breaking series gave the moral of the police a boost as well as demonstrated to the struggling democracy that their police force is working hard to uphold the rule of law in their war torn country.
